input.sentences: i went to the party with my friend last weekend .
there was a lot of alcohol there .
some people had a lot to drink .
there were a lot of couples there .
afterward we all got together to take some group photos .
output.sentences: over the weekend we went out to a friends party.
there was a good amount of drinking at the party.
Everyone seemed to be taking pictures by the end of it.
it was a nice chance to reinvigorate out love life.
And everyone had a great time, which always makes for the best memories
